name: @microfox/coingecko-sdk
title: CoinGecko SDK
description: A TypeScript SDK providing convenient access to CoinGecko API endpoints for retrieving cryptocurrency data like price, market information, and coin listings.

readme_map.title: CoinGecko SDK
readme_map.description: The full README for the CoinGecko SDK

all_readmes.description: Constructor for the CoinGeckoSDK. Initializes the SDK with the provided API key.
Pings the CoinGecko API server to check its status.
Checks the current API usage status.
Gets the simple price of one or more coins in a given currency.
Gets a list of all supported coins.
Gets market data for one or more coins.

constructors.name: CoinGeckoSDK
constructors.description: Create a new CoinGecko SDK client through which you can interact with the API
